```py
SELECT *
FROM <TABLE_NAME>
WHERE
    <TEXT_FIELD> IS NOT NULL AND <TEXT_FIELD> <> '' 
```

```py
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN MOD(<RECORD_KEY>, 10) < 8 THEN 'training'
    WHEN MOD(<RECORD_KEY>, 10) = 8 THEN 'evaluation'
    WHEN MOD(<RECORD_KEY>, 10) = 9 THEN 'test'
  END AS dataframe
FROM
  <TABLE_NAME>
```
